item.title: FT Most Read: Monday, March 31, 2025 at 11:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Trump says he is ‘not joking’ about seeking a third term in office
2. Global stock markets tumble as Trump’s tariffs loom
3. ‘I still have nightmares’: the tourists shackled and jailed for weeks at US borders
4. The people vs Musk: billionaire transforms Wisconsin court contest
5. Trump threatens secondary tariffs on Russian oil if no deal on Ukraine
item.guid: FT Most Read: Monday, March 31, 2025 at 11:15 AM UTC
